entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
